hxs6_list.hxs6d4: This set of textures was based on standard textures and largely reworked them to make them clearer and more saturated. Also, these textures will change the appearance of some blocks and objects, for example, bookshelves and a stove will look completely different, and having several variations at once. At the moment, only plant blocks, industrial blocks, rock blocks and a few others change textures.

Mine Ruins is a mod for Android game that adds a new structure to the game. This structure is a small entrance to the mine. Inside the mine there may be caves, there may be other spaces, for example, a large space for fighting mobs, abandoned paths. Externally, the entrance to the mine looks like a small abandoned basement. You can find a new structure in all forests. There are several treasures in the mine, but the path to them is limited by traps.
The Portal Gun mod will greatly simplify your movement around the game world: you can independently set the points of movement.

The Cheaper Netherite Recipe mod will add a new, simpler recipe for creating a netherite ingot to the game on Android. If earlier you had to spend a lot of time looking for netherite scrap in the amount of 4 pieces, and this could take more than 1 hour of playing, now you only need 3 scrap, which is certainly not much, but it will still help save time.

The Chechito Add-on mod for game on Android will add a new ore to the game, which will allow you to create new tools with improved qualities. At the moment, apart from ore and tools, there is nothing else in the mod, but in the next versions of the modification you can get much more interesting things and opportunities. You can find Chechito ore in any cave or mine, it is blue and you are unlikely to be able to walk past it.

Craftable Portals! - mod for game on Android, which will help the player to create blocks of two existing portals in the game. This will help you create borderless portals, as well as choose absolutely any shape for the portal. In addition, the player will not need to spend a lot of time looking for a fortress and mining 10 obsidian blocks. It will be enough to use new crafts to get into both worlds in Minecraft.

Re-Crafting - a mod for the game on Android, which allows for a return to craft certain items. Use the feedback can be crafting armor. But what is the opposite of Kraft? He will provide the diamond, iron armor and other resources back. It is important that for its implementation it is necessary to have a perfect armor that did not receive damage by the player. Incidentally, I wonder what you can get even more diamonds or iron than when crafting armor.
Australian Crafting Recipes is a mod that adds inverted recipes to the game. They can be useful, since now almost all items can be crafted in several ways. About 40+ new craft items have been added.
The Mining-Robot Function Pack mod adds a robot to the game that will take care of all your worries about the routine mining of ore!

The Craft the Unobtainable mod will make life easier for game players, because it allows you to craft items that were available only in creative mode. For example, now you can easily make yourself a portal block to the nether world or a glowing obsidian block.

The New Craft mod will be of interest only to those game players who would like to make it easier to craft improvised items, such as musk or a spider web, which will become much more convenient to create in survival mode.

This modification will add new potions to the game, which will allow you not only to restore health, but also to get new useful effects in the game on Android. In total, there are five new potions in the modification, each of which will be created using a unique recipe. This modification will be of interest to all players who are tired of standard potions with their hackneyed effects.

Many game players on Android really lack magic and witchcraft in the game, so this modification was created, which will add 18 new spells. To do this, new items and scrolls of spells will appear in the game, on which one of the 18 available spells can be applied and used as needed. Now you will have at your disposal not only a sword and a bow for fighting mobs, but also many very useful spells that you can cast at any time.

Wizardry is a mod for Android game that will add magic sticks to the game. There will be about 10 of them. Each stick allows you to give the player a certain effect, as well as attack other mobs in a special way. A new indicator has appeared called mana. With its help, the player will be able to use the sticks. Each use reduces the mana level. For it to recover, you need to wait a certain amount of time.

Do you know what the wizards living in the game world have been missing for so long? Full-fledged magic wands! Fortunately, the Magic Sticks mod fixes this problem, and also gives several varieties of this indispensable attribute of all magicians at once.

The dungeons in the game can be unfairly difficult in survival mode, but incredibly easy in creative mode. The Useful Staffs mod was designed to smooth over this injustice - now Minecraft PE players get a lot of useful staffs for more confident battles even with superior enemy forces.
Most game players have already thought about why the basic version lacks tools made of emeralds. In addition, before Emerald Items there was not even a mod that introduced them into Minecraft PE.
The Loginigun mod adds a portal cannon to the game, which you may have seen in the Portal series of games. It can only be used for decoration.

Installing the Useful Sides mod will significantly expand the list of blocks available in the game as decoration. Almost all 134 new objects have excellent textures. Now any Minecraft PE player can decide for himself how to use a certain block.
hxs6_list.hxs6t3: to the extended list of blocks

hxs6_list.hxs6d4: Very often you want to create a modern-style dwelling in a game, but to illuminate it you still have to use torches, which look, to put it mildly, strange, and also do not provide the required amount of light. Fortunately, this problem can be solved very easily by installing the Hidden Lights mod on your Minecraft PE.
